description: A harvest document holds links to information related to harvest activites or data.

as-harvested.description: A versioned link in OADA has _id an _rev in the link in order allow changes to bubble up from child to parents.

_id.description: _id identifies a resource in the OADA API.

_rev.description: _rev is the revision string for a resource in the OADA API.
